title: About Fewatsu
data: Fewatsu is an electronic manual library for the *Playdate console*.
Fewatsu's source code and documentation is available at *https://codeberg.org/nanobot567/fewatsu*.
Scan the QR code below to check it out!

items: R.Y.E, as always, for being there. _i kasta ca taikatsu'y erise, kairera._

data: nanobot567 - programming, sound effects, background music
